comment.author: 30085166@N00
comment._content: Polish-American boxer Stanley Ketchel (birth name Stanislaus Kiecal) was born in Grand Rapids Michigan, September 14, 1886. In his brief professional boxing career he won the middleweight championship twice, and held that title at the time he was murdered, on October 15, 1910. A biography of Ketchel can be found at: www.boxrec.com/media/index.php/Stanley_Ketchel
